Posts.EditableText: Hi! My friend and I are just getting into interactive fiction - we're currently designing our own game with Quest, but we also tried out some existing games for fun. One of the games we downloaded was Forever Always (we'll post a link below for those who have never tried it), and though the game is very short, we just can't seem to finish it! We always fail quickly during the second part, and we can't figure out what to say. We really want to finish this game and we haven't managed to join the author, so we'd really appreciate it if anyone who has beaten the game in the past (or can manage to beat it now) could give us some pointers! Posts.HTML:
Hi!

My friend and I are just getting into interactive fiction - we're currently designing our own game with Quest, but we also tried out some existing games for fun.

One of the games we downloaded was Forever Always (we'll post a link below for those who have never tried it), and though the game is very short, we just can't seem to finish it! We always fail quickly during the second part, and we can't figure out what to say.

We really want to finish this game and we haven't managed to join the author, so we'd really appreciate it if anyone who has beaten the game in the past (or can manage to beat it now) could give us some pointers!

( http://www.ifarchive.org/indexes/if-arc ... Xtads.html - ''forever.zip'' )
